TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiverHook
Public Class HttpServerChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannelReceiver, IChannelReceiverHook
type HttpServerChannel = class inherit BaseChannelWithProperties interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelReceiverHook

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 HTTP 协议传输消息的服务器信道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道传输跨远程处理边界（例如，在应用程序域中的计算机之间）的消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 类使用 HTTP 协议传输消息。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时，调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后对其进行反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要在服务器端执行额外的消息处理，你可以指定通过 其传递的所有消息所通过的的实现 。To perform additional processing of messages on the server-side, you can specify an implementation of the through which all messages processed by the are passed. 接受序列化为二进制或 SOAP 格式的消息。The accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. 对象具有关联的配置属性，这些属性可以在配置文件中（通过调用静态 方法）或以编程方式（通过将 集合传递给 构造函数）在运行时设置。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅的文档 。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象设置远程处理服务器及其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a object to set up a remoting server and its client. 该示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 服务器A server - 客户端A client - 服务器和客户端使用的远程对象A remote object used by the server and the client 下面的代码示例演示了一个服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例演示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/client.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/client.cs#30)] 下面的代码示例显示了服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/common.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/common.cs#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能，请将参数设置 `sinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#12)]

summary.span: 使用给定名称初始化 类的新实例，该实例侦听指定的端口。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given name and that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数设置属性 `name` 。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果要注册多个通道，则每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要请求动态分配可用端口，请将参数设置 `port` 为0（零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#13)]

summary.span: 获取当前信道的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.

value.span: 一个包含信道名称的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定通道 。This name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制通道数据在实例中的显示顺序 ; 较高优先级的通道显示在低优先级通道之前。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 客户端会按照实例中列出的顺序尝试连接到服务器通道 。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelScheme As String
public: property System::String ^ ChannelScheme { System::String ^ get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Should always be for .

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需调用此方法即可开始在新初始化的通道上进行侦听。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用此方法可以在 调用方法停止侦听通道之后，重新启动在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号，则在重新启动侦听时，端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Should always be for .

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法停止在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新启动侦听，请使用 方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号，则在重新启动侦听时，端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.
